item.title: Video Color Grading Expert Needed For Music Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone,

I am seeking color grading / colorization on a music video for a rock song (a single release). I took care to capture the best raw footage I could (shot on an Iphone 14 in ProRes / 4k mode), and am performing the rough edit of the video myself, but the final step of color grading is outside my expertise, so I'm seeking help in this area. I want the final product to look the best that it can, while being true to the style / concept of the video and song. I am seeking someone who is able to approach things not only in a technical way, but also creatively, in terms of finding what suits this video best, aesthetically. I would love to have a conversation about that with you, and hear your ideas / input.

If this seems like a project you would like to take on, or learn more about, please reach out! I've attached a few quick shots from the video in this post. Thank you.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Film, Narrative Video, Video Color Correction, Video Cleanup, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Skills: Color Grading, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Film, Narrative Video, Video Color Correction, Video Cleanup, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for a short documentary - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a passion for spiritual documentaries? I'm on the hunt for someone just like you to join our exciting new project.

**About the Gig:**
Iam diving into the world of spiritual documentaries and need your editing expertise to bring our vision to life. The first video is a 90-minute journey filled with captivating footage content, mainly consisting our of interviews. Don't worry about sourcing materials – I've got access to premium stock video websites to enhance your creativity. All documentaries are interviews with one person.

**What We're Looking For:**
We're seeking a video editing wizard who understands the intricacies of spiritual storytelling. If you've got experience in this genre or are eager to delve into it, we want to hear from you! Check out "Inner Worlds, Outer Worlds" on YouTube to get a feel for our style.

**Why You Should Join Us:**
This isn't just a one-time gig – I'm planning to release new documentaries every 2-3 weeks, and if we click from the start, there's potential for a long-term collaboration. Iam looking for someone who's available for a committed partnership and potentially interested in full-time work down the line.

**How to Apply:**
Ready to showcase your editing skills and be part of something special? Tell me why you're the perfect fit for our projects. Share your experience, your passion for spiritual storytelling, and your availability for the long haul.


Budget: $75
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Full-time Video Editor for Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled full-time video editor to create engaging ads for our company.
As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage into polished videos that align with our brand guidelines. Create the best hooks, add motions, music, and everything that will make the video pop up and the viewer not able to take their eyes off of it!

We are looking for a passionate long-term team member who wants to be one of us, enjoy a competitive salary and adjustable schedule with the best parks and benefits for years to come.

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling, attention to detail, and proficiency in video editing software. You will work closely with our marketing team to bring our ads to life and captivate our target audience. If you have a passion for creating visually stunning content and a strong portfolio showcasing your previous work, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Marketing and copywriting background
- Strong storytelling and creative skills
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work on tight deadlines

Applying for this position you will be required for a video editing task, if we love the outcome we will invite you to an interview to set up expectations about working together. It's only 2 steps process to find the best fit. Please don't apply if you aren't able to commit to it.

Waiting for our next team member. Can it be you?

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 23:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I have a YouTube channel in the technology niche and I’m looking for someone who can edit long-form review videos for my YouTube channel, usually around the 8-13 minute length.

Here is an example channel: https://www.youtube.com/@BrettInTech

Here is an example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sL15VM-xN60

Skills:

- Good video editing skills
- Able to edit 3 videos per week
- Good communication
- Delivering on deadlines

Job Criteria

- 3 videos per week
- $25 per every video

I'll provide the voiceovers and the script. The video editor is required to find stock footage that matches the script that will be provided and will also screen record a few pages.

I would love to see example work. Please be sure to message only when you AGREED to the price.

This is going to be a long-term job with about 3 videos per week. I will be paying $25 per video and will increase it as time goes on.

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Ugc ads - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: UGC Video Content Creator for HVAC Company

Company: DucktPros
Location: Miami, FL (Remote work available)
Position: UGC Video Content Creator
Type: Freelance/Contract (Potential for ongoing work)

About Us:
DucktPros is a leading HVAC company based in Miami, specializing in air duct cleaning and HVAC services. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service and maintaining a strong connection with our customers. To enhance our marketing efforts, we are looking for a talented UGC (User-Generated Content) Video Content Creator to produce engaging and authentic video content that resonates with our audience.

Job Overview:
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented UGC Video Content Creator to produce two high-quality videos showcasing our HVAC services, including new system installations. If the initial videos meet our expectations, there will be opportunities for ongoing projects. The ideal candidate will have experience creating compelling video content, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for storytelling.

Responsibilities:

Produce two engaging UGC videos that highlight DucktPros' HVAC services, including new system installations, customer satisfaction, and the benefits of our offerings.
Collaborate with the marketing team to understand the project requirements and brand guidelines.
Capture authentic and relatable content that resonates with our target audience.
Edit and polish videos to ensure high-quality production, including adding music, captions, and graphics as needed.
Deliver final videos in a timely manner, adhering to project deadlines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating UGC or similar video content.
Strong storytelling skills with a focus on engaging and authentic content.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Understanding of HVAC services and new system installations is a plus.
If you are passionate about creating engaging video content and want to work with a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your portfolio and a brief description of your experience.



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:UGC, Google Ads, Facebook, Internet Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Advertising, Display Ad
Skills: UGC, Google Ads, Facebook, Internet Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Advertising, Display Ad
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Dynamic Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
As our Social Media Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality video content that aligns with our brand's vision and social media strategy. You will work closely with our content creators to bring creative ideas to life and ensure our videos stand out in the digital landscape.

Key Responsibilities:

Video Editing: Edit and produce engaging video content for our social media platforms, including short clips, interactive videos, and other creative formats.
Collaboration: Work closely with content creators, marketers, and other team members to develop and execute innovative video concepts that resonate with our audience.
Creativity: Think outside the box to create videos that are not only visually appealing but also interactive and engaging for viewers.
Quality Control: Ensure that all video content meets our brand's standards for quality and consistency.
Trend Awareness: Stay up to date with the latest social media trends and video editing techniques to keep our content fresh and relevant.
Feedback and Improvement: Be open to feedback and continuously seek ways to enhance the effectiveness of our video content.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing, preferably focusing on social media content.
Strong proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects).
Creative mindset with the ability to produce innovative and engaging video content.
Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.
Can work on a CST Time zone to ensure no delays and up to date with any requests.

Hourly Range: $9.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Culo, an eco-friendly brand specializing in luxurious bamboo underwear, is seeking a talented videographer to capture an exciting flash mob event in London (Marble Arch Station - Leicester Square via Regents St & Piccadilly Circus). You will film 200 participants proudly walking through the city in our sustainable underwear, creating engaging footage that showcases our commitment to style, comfort, and the environment. If you’re creative, passionate about sustainability, and have a knack for dynamic storytelling, we’d love to see your work!

Culo, an eco-friendly brand specializing in luxurious bamboo underwear, is seeking a talented videographer to capture an exciting flash mob event in London (Marble Arch Station - Leicester Square via Regents St & Piccadilly Circus). You will film 200 participants proudly walking through the city in our sustainable underwear, creating engaging footage that showcases our commitment to style, comfort, and the environment. If you’re creative, passionate about sustainability, and have a knack for dynamic storytelling, we’d love to see your work!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:18 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Event Photography, Adobe Premiere Pro, People, Fashion & Apparel, Final Cut Pro
Skills: Videography, Event Photography, Adobe Premiere Pro, People, Fashion & Apparel, Final Cut Pro
Country: ESP
